thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Clare Fiore Robinson
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Clare Fiore Robinson

author: Clare Fiore Robinson
title: Clare Fiore Robinson
text: I have used trusted house sitters on a number of occasions and find the website really easy to use with lots of tools which keep improving. One further improvement could be to bulk manage emails as archiving them etc. individually takes time. We have always found good and reliable house sitters through the site. Only complaint is that value for money on subscription is not as good as it used to be.
